org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp

Class AmpTrivialMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiReportedEntity<K>
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiReportMeasure<CategAmountCell>
        • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiPredicateTransactionMeasure
          • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.schema.NiTransactionMeasure
            • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.AmpTrivialMeasure

  • public class AmpTrivialMeasure
extends NiTransactionMeasure
    a straightforward NiTransactionMeasure which converts AMP-specific configuration info into Ni-generic predicates

      • AmpTrivialMeasure

        public AmpTrivialMeasure(java.lang.String measureName,
                         long transactionType,
                         java.lang.String adjustmentTypeName,
                         boolean directed,
                         boolean ignoreFilters,
                         Behaviour<NiAmountCell> overridingBehaviour)
        trivial measure defined by a transaction type (say, Commitments), an adjustment name (say, Actual), a directed/not directed boolean, an ignore/obey filters boolean and a behaviour. In case behaviour is null, a context-based one will be deducted from the combination of the other parameters
